# Task metadata element schema

**Description:** Task metadata element schema generated by the CEDAR Template Editor 2.6.56

## Task Type

**Label:** taskType

**Description:** Human-readable abbreviated task type name.

**Required:** No

**Input Type:** Not specified

**Value Relation Links:** [Link](https://schema.metadatacenter.org/properties/91b1448f-aff4-4748-9fbb-83b0aca41a6c) <details>
<summary>Field Schema JSON</summary>

```json
{
  "type": "array",
  "minItems": 1,
  "items": {
    "type": "object",
    "@type": "https://schema.metadatacenter.org/core/TemplateField",
    "@context": {
      "xsd": "http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#",
      "pav": "http://purl.org/pav/",
      "bibo": "http://purl.org/ontology/bibo/",
      "oslc": "http://open-services.net/ns/core#",
      "schema": "http://schema.org/",
      "skos": "http://www.w3.org/2004/02/skos/core#",
      "schema:name": {
        "@type": "xsd:string"
      },
      "schema:description": {
        "@type": "xsd:string"
      },
      "skos:prefLabel": {
        "@type": "xsd:string"
      },
      "skos:altLabel": {
        "@type": "xsd:string"
      },
      "pav:createdOn": {
        "@type": "xsd:dateTime"
      },
      "pav:createdBy": {
        "@type": "@id"
      },
      "pav:lastUpdatedOn": {
        "@type": "xsd:dateTime"
      },
      "oslc:modifiedBy": {
        "@type": "@id"
      }
    },
    "title": "taskType field schema",
    "description": "taskType field schema generated by the CEDAR Template Editor 2.6.54",
    "_ui": {
      "inputType": "checkbox"
    },
    "_valueConstraints": {
      "requiredValue": true,
      "multipleChoice": true,
      "literals": [
        {
          "label": "resting"
        },
        {
          "label": "video"
        },
        {
          "label": "reward"
        },
        {
          "label": "other"
        }
      ]
    },
    "properties": {
      "@type": {
        "oneOf": [
          {
            "type": "string",
            "format": "uri"
          },
          {
            "type": "array",
            "minItems": 1,
            "items": {
              "type": "string",
              "format": "uri"
            },
            "uniqueItems": true
          }
        ]
      },
      "@value": {
        "type": [
          "string",
          "null"
        ]
      },
      "rdfs:label": {
        "type": [
          "string",
          "null"
        ]
      }
    },
    "required": [
      "@value"
    ],
    "additionalProperties": false,
    "pav:createdOn": "2024-05-13T04:08:31-07:00",
    "pav:createdBy": "https://metadatacenter.org/users/f3d8067f-c204-45c0-8fb1-8393e486593c",
    "pav:lastUpdatedOn": "2024-05-13T04:08:31-07:00",
    "oslc:modifiedBy": "https://metadatacenter.org/users/f3d8067f-c204-45c0-8fb1-8393e486593c",
    "schema:schemaVersion": "1.6.0",
    "schema:name": "taskType",
    "schema:description": "Human-readable abbreviated task type name.",
    "skos:prefLabel": "Task Type",
    "@id": "https://repo.metadatacenter.org/template-fields/81b2ff4c-47ee-423a-88c0-70b45f24c14f",
    "$schema": "http://json-schema.org/draft-04/schema#"
  }
}
```
</details>

## Other Task Name

**Label:** otherTask

**Description:** Name of the task if not listed in the task type.

**Required:** No

**Input Type:** textfield

**Value Relation Links:** [Link](https://schema.metadatacenter.org/properties/62792edf-b2a1-45a1-954e-608c9e205f43) <details>
<summary>Field Schema JSON</summary>

```json
{
```

## Task Name (BIDS Naming)

**Label:** taskName

**Description:** Name of the tasks that would be used in naming the files according to the BIDS specification.

**Required:** No

**Input Type:** Not specified

**Value Relation Links:** [Link](https://schema.metadatacenter.org/properties/7cd10fd6-9766-49a9-9238-1a7567f9cee8) <details>
<summary>Field Schema JSON</summary>

```json
{
  "type": "array",
  "minItems": 1,
  "items": {
    "type": "object",
    "@id": "https://repo.metadatacenter.org/template-fields/2fcd26e5-d38e-4200-a221-fe3bb8411bca",
```

## Task Configuration Files

**Label:** taskConfig

**Description:** Relative or absolute path to the configuration file used for each of the specified task.

**Required:** No

**Input Type:** Not specified

<details>
<summary>Field Schema JSON</summary>

```json
{
  "type": "array",
  "minItems": 0,
  "items": {
    "@type": "https://schema.metadatacenter.org/core/TemplateField",
    "@context": {
      "xsd": "http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#",
      "pav": "http://purl.org/pav/",
      "bibo": "http://purl.org/ontology/bibo/",
      "oslc": "http://open-services.net/ns/core#",
      "schema": "http://schema.org/",
      "skos": "http://www.w3.org/2004/02/skos/core#",
      "schema:name": {
        "@type": "xsd:string"
      },
      "schema:description": {
        "@type": "xsd:string"
      },
      "skos:prefLabel": {
        "@type": "xsd:string"
      },
      "skos:altLabel": {
        "@type": "xsd:string"
      },
      "pav:createdOn": {
        "@type": "xsd:dateTime"
      },
      "pav:createdBy": {
        "@type": "@id"
      },
      "pav:lastUpdatedOn": {
        "@type": "xsd:dateTime"
      },
      "oslc:modifiedBy": {
        "@type": "@id"
      }
    },
    "type": "string",
    "title": "taskConfig field schema",
    "description": "taskConfig field schema generated by the CEDAR Template Editor 2.6.54",
    "_ui": {
      "inputType": "attribute-value"
    },
    "schema:name": "taskConfig",
    "schema:description": "Relative or absolute path to the configuration file used for each of the specified task.",
    "pav:createdOn": "2024-05-13T04:08:31-07:00",
    "pav:createdBy": "https://metadatacenter.org/users/f3d8067f-c204-45c0-8fb1-8393e486593c",
    "pav:lastUpdatedOn": "2024-05-13T04:08:31-07:00",
    "oslc:modifiedBy": "https://metadatacenter.org/users/f3d8067f-c204-45c0-8fb1-8393e486593c",
    "schema:schemaVersion": "1.6.0",
    "additionalProperties": false,
    "skos:prefLabel": "Task Configuration Files",
    "@id": "https://repo.metadatacenter.org/template-fields/af9c37de-d312-4bf3-8af2-89fa1d0a304a",
    "$schema": "http://json-schema.org/draft-04/schema#"
  }
}
```
</details>

## Task Description

**Label:** taskDescription

**Description:** A text based description of the tasks used for the data.

**Required:** Yes

**Input Type:** textfield

**Value Relation Links:** [Link](https://schema.metadatacenter.org/properties/4dbc2a9c-70a5-4a58-8531-5fd6ff044a1a) <details>
<summary>Field Schema JSON</summary>

```json
{
```
